title: Virginia basketball falls in rematch to Virginia Tech 62-53 - University of Virginia The Cavalier Daily
content:
1. Virginia basketball falls in rematch to Virginia Tech 62-53  University of Virginia The Cavalier Daily

  3. Virginia Tech basketball: ESPN analyst praises Cassell Coliseum  Gobbler Country
  4. Aluma Takes Over Late, Virginia Tech Beats Virginia, 62-53  The ACC

description: Despite good performances from Virginia's front court, the lack of perimeter shooting was ultimately the demise of the Cavaliers in the rivalry game.
